_comment: OPA189 - Precision, Low Noise, Zero-Drift Operational Amplifier
description: OPA189 Precision Low Noise Zero-Drift Op-Amp configured as LNA
_comment_G: Gain, dB (configured via external resistors for 20 dB gain)
_comment_NF: Noise Figure, dB (calculated from 2.2 nV/√Hz input noise at 1 kHz)
_comment_BW_LNA: Bandwidth, Hz (2 MHz typical for OPA189)
_comment_Z_in: Input impedance, Ohms (very high for CMOS op-amp, typical >1 GOhm)
_comment_V_max: Maximum output voltage, V (rail-to-rail operation, typical 5V supply)
_comment_input_noise: Input voltage noise, V/√Hz (2.2 nV/√Hz at 1 kHz from datasheet)
_comment_input_bias_current: Input bias current, A (1 pA typical for CMOS)
_comment_offset_voltage: Input offset voltage, V (0.5 µV typical, zero-drift architecture)
